title: Immediate Beta Approval and faster beta submission
body: I think there are two ways to improve the beta program:

comments.body: When only adding app info such as Description, beta testers or similar.. The app should not go trough the certification process and so on.

When in beta, its not important to me that I'm missing a screenshot for the store or that my badge icon for scale 240 is missing. Its in beta, I really just need to get my build to my remote QA guy who has a phone but doesn't know his or her way around Visual Studio.

It's frustrating to have to enter app description and upload a screenshot for every language even though it's only a beta and description and screenshot are not important. I would like to have option to use international description and screenshot for all languages.
